version_description: • New command RemovableDiscontinuity() for broken rational functions (also for previews)
• New command RemovableDiscontinuity() for broken rational functions (also for previews)
• New command RemovableDiscontinuity() for broken rational functions (also for previews)

• New: Easily get the 5 number summary of statistics (Min, Q1, Median, Q3, Max) for lists of numbers
• It is now possible to duplicate the output of calculations in the Algebra View
• New command PlotSolve(): Solves an equation in x and displays the result in the Graphics View
• Bug fixes and lots of improvements under the hood
